``` {r, setup, echo = FALSE, cache = TRUE}
base_path <- fs::path(
  "..", "models", "2023", "DiscardVariance", "base"
)
inputs <- r4ss::SS_read(base_path, verbose = FALSE)
report <- r4ss::SS_output(
  base_path,
  printstats = FALSE,
  verbose = FALSE
)
```

### Figure

![](../models/2023/DiscardVariance/base/plots/catch2 landings stacked.png){fig-align="center"}

### Table

```{r}
knitr::kable(
  inputs[["dat"]][["catch"]] |>
    dplyr::mutate(
      catch = format(round(catch, 2), big.mark = ","),
      fleet = factor(fleet, labels = c("fixed-gear", "trawl"))
    ) |>
    dplyr::filter(year >= 0) |>
    dplyr::select(year, fleet, catch) |>
    tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = fleet, values_from = catch) |>
    dplyr::arrange(-year),
  align = "lrr"
)
```
:::
